Blog.post: yea i fuckin knifed myself.. go laugh... hahahaha wut an ass.. well.. there are lotsa pics of *cough* sumone in here.. they hurt too look at but i can't bring myself to delete them.. so i have to deal w/ it.. and so do u.. sorry...

lol so whazzap w/ everyone out there?? lol yea i'm hyper so wut?? so.. anyone got any good ideas about stuff to do!?!?!?! i gots nuthin.. i never get out and i never talk to pplz.. and .. just.. i dunno aahahhh!!! registration is tomorrow.. i wanna go.. but at the same time i dun wanna go.. it's just BAD.. lol.. dun ask me why i just DUNNO!!! lol i'm havin problems today and i'm sleepy.. i guess i'll prolly actually get sleep tonight.. i dunno though.. w/e.. well byes for now.. more later...

it's been three days since the last time i put in a post lol.. i'm bored.. and i dunno.. been cryin alot lately.. for my own petty reasons.. but i guess i'm o.k. now.. a bit sleepy.. and fellin really sick.. i was sick a few times last night and this morning.. but i think it was just from the weeks crappy events... *sigh* i hope everything is better now..tell me if ya know it is.. lol.. well i love you all.. i'm not in a very good modd but i'm not pissed or nuthin.. lol call me
everyone is on the topic of sex right now.. i hate it.. so annyoing.. it's like it's all they think about.. oohh wait.. they are guys.. pigs.. wut can i expect.. lol... haahhaha ya.. w/e

i dunno... lol.. Steven and Adam are here riding dirtbikes.. they're out and around.. lol can't find 'em. argh so i'm in here typing.... well nuthin better to do.. as of this second i gots Nirvana playin 'cause most of my music clips aren't working but wut can i say i downloaded 'em so it's my fault.. lol.... did i already mention that i can't wait 'till Keegan gets home? ya i prolly did.. sorry if it bothers you guys that i talk about him too much but i just can't help it.. ohh well. love yas bye
R U GUYZ BI?? 'CAUSE U JUST JUDGED A GUY!!!! LOL

geez.. really bored.. nothing to do nothing to type about... man! i can't wait 'till Keegan gats home.. he's been gone for way too long but he should be back.. umm.. soon i think... :( i miss 'em... wwwaa.. lol.. o.k. done whining now.. so what's everyone up to?? if u read this right now i am on AIM but i won't be talkin much.. frankly my dears i dun give a damn if u wanna talk to me.. i dun feel like talkin to you guys.. no offense just dun feel like it.... lol hahahahaahahah well byez... more later?
me and Becky are talking again.. lol we kinda spazzed that's all.. YAY!! *woo-hoo*

honestly i dunno wut to talk about... lol.. well i got a call from a dude i dunno and.. i dunno lol ya.. i say that alot 'cause there's nuthin to talk about.. any ideas?? lol well my baby cousin's here.. i'm about to strangle her 'cause she's gettin into EVERYTHING!! she's picking up the damned cat and just about strangling it!! agh!!!!! HELP ME.. ohh ya and if you read this ask me about my new carvings (if ya know wut i mean) lol i gots really bored last night and decided to go for a few more.. lol couldn't find a pencil though so i used a pen.. hope it turns out well.. o.k. byes more later

i got hungry a few mins ago.. so i got up and went to the kitchen.. well the light was on already so i turned it off and went and got food.. which just so happened to be a salad.. well i had to keep the fridge open just so i could see.. geez i'm bright.. about as bright as a dim.. no wait.. broken light bulb...

oohh yes it's another one! lol so much fun annoying anyone who reads this stuff.. do i talk too much?? lol.. well anyways does anyone else think Meegs is hott? do you even know who he is?? prolly not.. i'll post a pic. of him in a min. but for right now i think i'll just randomly type about stuff... does anyone else think my bud Tim's hott??? geez it gets on my nerves my buds always walk up to me and say "oohh u used to go wit Tim?? he's hott" agh!!! whew! lol this is so funny... i can't think of anything to write about.. i used up all my creative energy earlier today.... wwaa.. no fair.. i liked being creative... oohh!! we gets pizza tonight!! yay for pizza.. again.. lol... oohh well i'm gettin yelled at for being mouthy.. about a pizza! OMG! agh!!!!!!!!! just.. bye..
guess wut?!?! no jk i dun have anything to write about.. just thought i'd do this prove myself right!! lol well byez

someone on buddy pic. says i have nice lips... WTF!!!? i'm really confused i put that pic on there knowing it looked really friggin bad and i get pplz saying it's hott... AGH!! i dun want pplz liking me it dun make sense!!! anyways i was looking at my pix and realised i dun have any good pix of either me or Keegan.. BLAH! i need better pix so if anyone has a good pic of me feel free to e-mail it to me Gdsmac8@yahoo.com or better yet if you have a good pic of Keegan send it to me... no wait!! better yet a pic of both of us together!! lol sorry too bored not much else to think of so don't spaz at me for talking about it alot... lol anyways.. bye? i'll prolly think of sumthing else to write and add in another post within a few mins... lol

ya.. as it says i've been thinking lately.. i know i know you're prolly going OMG she actually thinks.. anyways.. Tim's gotten me started on lotsa stuff.. my music and some of my style.. so i gues i owe lots to him eh? lol well anyways if he ever gets around to reading this.. thanx! lol hahahahahahaha ya if this is wut i do when i think then i'm pretty boring.. agh! been going around eating that pizza.. ya ur thinking damn that was a long time ago when i made that pizza but i'm such a pig i went and made another lol.. ya so right now i'm bored snagging c2 and shit so.. BLAH!! nm to do here.. may just go back to sleep.. but l8er i'm gonna go swim and maybe bug Steven and Adam i know they're prolly out and about now.. just go down there and cramp 'em up a bit or go out paintball w/ 'em.. which brings up yet another subj... PAINTBALL!! i've never been out paintballin' b4 but they want me to go w/ 'em so i can beat the crap outta' 'em all.... WTF? i dunno wut to do and i dun gotta gun.. but they said Andy 'll prolly let me use Ryan's old one since he gots a new one.. well ya.. anyways if anyone thinks i should go out and paintball w/ 'em comment and tell me.. 'cause i know that crap hurts but i dunno if i should.. help? lol more later...

i keep getting new stuff for pplz to look at.. so if you like the piccys here then you'll see them again if you go to these things.. http://www.flickr.com/people/gdsmac7/ http://www.flickr.com/photos/gdsmac7/ they're just for entertainemt.. so nothing really important in any of these... still working on my website.. not going too well but.. ya know i'm trying.. more updates later
and incase you wanted to know my website is http://www.freewebs.com/lambofthegoddess there should be some cool stuff on there eventually.. but ya never know!

lately i've been trying to get things straightened out w/ my website but it's not working so well.. trying to put some damned background music on it but it's not working!! agh! sumone help me it's making me nuts.. lol so anyways i just got pizza outta the fridge!! yes you heard me.. pizza meaning i'm eating again.. but it's good for you pizza spinach and mushroom pizza.. i hate mushrooms but they're good on pizza lol.. well this is an uneventful post.. sorry if you don't like it but i'm puting on lotsa posts lately.. oohh ya and lookie at the pics. i put on here... they're not the best but i figure pplz can be nice enough to comment on 'em and tell me wut you think.. hope you guys are enjoying an inside look at my life..

where have i been? the days just seem to fly by and i never understand where they went... many days spent away, never at home but then again no where else either... so where am i? drifting off into space, time slowly stops... no where to go now, nothing to do... so why don't i feel any different?

well, Becky's dad is looking for a job still but you prolly didn't know that if you don't know me that well.. you see she just moved to Nashville 'cause her dad don't have a job no more.. well there's no job for 'em in Nashville so he's lloking everywhere and he's trying real hard to get this one job in Michigan.. well i'm thinking that's awesome.. i was born there and it's really nice.. but Becky's spazzing that they'd have to move into a "small" town i'm like STFU! ya know.. there's less pplz living here then there were in that damned town of hers... well anyways. i'm realy sensitive about pplz making fun of Michigan 'cause i love it there so much and she goes off and says she dun wanna live in SOME STUPID HICK TOWN in Michigan... agh! this may sound stupid to you guys but it got me really pissed at her.. so.. just stay off the topic of Michigan for a while m'kay? ;) luv yas.. more stuff LATER...

well i figured i'd create my own survey just to get on pplz nerves... send it to lotsa pplz and have 'em fill it out time began? full name? birth date? sign? fav. color? fav. band? fav. song? fav. singer? fav. letter? parents names? BF/ GF's name? best buds name? how many pplz are in your address book? last phone call to? last phone call from? last e-mail to? last e-mail from? last person that made you laugh? last person that made you cry? last kiss from? farthest from home you've been? longest time away from home? best pick-up line you've ever heard? worst pick-up line you've heard? last movie you saw? best movie you saw? worst movie you saw? last person you went to a movie w/? phone number? last food eaten? did you enjoy the survey? do you ever wanna fill out another one? have i annoyed the hell out of you w/ this? happy it's over? time ended?

well the name of my blog was kinda random.. i was watching the badgers thingie on Ebaums world... http://www.ebaumsworld.com/badgers.html well this ting here rocks.. anyways... it was about the 4th of July and i insisted that all of the fireworks i got were Bottlerockets.. so mum went and bought me 8 or 9 packs of bottlerockets... well i go out and shoot them off for a while.. get shot by a few.. now i'm covered in burn marks.. well anyways while i was shooting 'em i just randomly said badgers and had to go inside to watch the cute little badgers on the screen... so that's how it all began... lol hope you like the story... (it's true)
lotsa posts today eh? well i guess that makes sense... i just started this darned thing today.. well, eventually i'll forget to write in this just like all the other blogs... AGH!
